Spectacular hats!!!

comment.author: 33775116@N00
comment._content: Must have been a party of something! Fascinating!

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Perhaps Mrs. James Cunningham Bishop, the former Miss Abigail Hancock. Married in 1891, she divorced him in 1913. See query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9907E4D6123BE633A... It was clearly a very public divorce. But I'm not sure that could be the context for this picture.
